entry.title: Property-based testing for Bitcoin Core
entry.summary: The email emphasizes the importance and need for property testing within the software industry, highlighting its critical role in ensuring projects are well-understood. It acknowledges the recipient's efforts in advocating for property testing, suggesting that such advocacy is necessary across the software sector. The sender, while not directly involved with Bitcoin Core, expresses strong support for continued efforts in promoting property testing, indicating a belief in its value for improving project quality and understanding. This encouragement reflects a wider recognition of property testing's potential to enhance software development practices.
